noun.description: A joke exploiting the different possible meanings of a word or the fact that there are words which sound alike but have different meanings.
examples: the pigs were a squeal (if you'll forgive the pun)

verb.description: Make a joke exploiting the different possible meanings of a word.
examples: his first puzzle punned on composers, with answers like “Handel with care” and “Haydn go seek”

origin: Mid 16th century: dialect variant of pound.
